experiment_id.description: The ID of the experiment containing the runs to restore.

min_timestamp_millis.description:
The minimum deletion timestamp in milliseconds
since the UNIX epoch for restoring runs. Only runs
deleted no earlier than this timestamp are restored.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Bulk restore runs in an experiment that were deleted no earlier than the specified timestamp. Restores at most max_runs per request. To call this API from a Databricks Notebook in Python, you can use the client code snippet on
